column4: Hi guys! One question, do you think 256RAM for gnome is not enough? I am asking.. at work got 1GB and it is blazing fast. Here, at home got 256 and sometimes i really slows down :/
i think that depends on your own view. you could try fluxbox- that's very friendly to your ressources
yea i feel you.. gnome is very nice system
well then i would save my money
